title: Первый снег
author: Sokolovsky Oleg
description:
Oleg Sokolovskiy is one of the best landscape masters. His works is a real fairy tale. The road in the center of the painting is almost uncovered. This ditail pushes to assume that this is an early winter. The first snow lies on each branch of trees aside the road. All these leave the impression of a miracle. This artpiece is done with oil on canvas. 'The First Snow' is related to realism being a representative of landscapes genre. 

This artwork took part in several art festivals and exhibitions approved by corresponding certificates and galleries art catalogues.

Pay attention: Upon buying the digitalized copy of this masterpiece in Ultra HD 1:1 resolution, you will receive the original physical Authentic Painting.
